properties.description: The title of this publication.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: A term that best describes the genre of the object. Terms should be taken from one of two vocabularies: MARC Genre Terms, or the Art and Architecture Thesaurus.
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: The authoritative source of your genre term. Local terms should be used very sparingly.
properties.title: Genre vocabulary

properties.description: Abstract or summary of the item
properties.title: Abstract

properties.description: Indicate whether or not the article is peer-reviewed.
properties.title: Peer reviewed?

properties.description: Authors and contributors to the item; Full author names are entered when they appear in the author position of an article, usually on the title page of an article.
properties.title: Names

properties.description: Type of name. Use "personal" for individuals. Use "corporate" for group others, e.g. the Consortium of Investigators of Modifiers of BRCA1 and BRCA2 (CIMBA) on PMID: 17466083
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Use for personal names.
properties.title: First name & Middle Initial *

properties.description: Use for personal names.
properties.title: Last Name

properties.description: Use only for corporate names.
properties.title: Corporate Name

properties.description: Used for connecting to a Person record, if scholar profiles exist. Enter the full name in direct order, with the scholar's identifier in parentheses. Example: Brandon Weigel (bweigel)
properties.title: Qualified Name

properties.description: If the author is not affiliated with your institution, optionally add the institution name as well (department, institution).
properties.title: Department

properties.description: If the author has an ORCID, add it here
properties.title: ORCID

properties.description: Need to distinguish between: meeting abstracts, news and commentary, review articles, etc.; Need to further define books and book chapters
properties.title: Type of Work

properties.description: Prefer LCSH terms for Topical subject headings.
properties.title: Topic

properties.description: This status would reflect if an item: has been submitted to a journal; accepted for publication; corrected proof available; final article published
properties.title: Publication Status

properties.description: A collection of fields that are used to identify this publication for a variety of systems and purposes.
properties.title: Identifiers

properties.description: International Standard Book Number
properties.title: ISBN

properties.description: International Standard Serial Number
properties.title: ISSN

properties.description: Electronic ISSN
properties.title: ISSN

properties.description: Digital object identifier of the item
properties.title: DOI

properties.description: The PubMed identifier for the item; ISI number for Web of Science records; etc.
properties.title: Accession Number

properties.description: The PubMed Central Identifier for the item.
properties.title: PMCID

properties.description: A URI for the item, potentially an HTTP URL.
properties.title: URI

properties.description: Other article identifier not listed above, if required.
properties.title: Other

properties.description: Information about the citation object's parent publication (journal, book, etc.).
properties.title: Parent publication info

properties.description: Date of the journal, book, etc. that contains this object. This is a separate entry from the Date Issued earlier in this form, which is the primary Date field for this object.
properties.title: Date

properties.description: Volume the article is published in.
properties.title: Volume

properties.description: The issue of the volume the paper corresponds with.
properties.title: Issue

properties.description: The language(s) the item is published in.
properties.title: Language

properties.description: Select a language from iso639-2b vocabulary: http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
Information pertaining to either the book or journal which contains this resource.
properties.title: Host Resource

properties.description: The title of the host document for this publication. This will be the book title in the case of book chapters or the journal title in the case of journal articles.
properties.title: Journal/Book/Host Title

properties.description: The abbreviated host title, as designated by NLM or ISO.
properties.title: Abbreviated Journal/Book/Host Title

properties.description: How the host item is issued (e.g. continuing, monographic, etc.)
properties.title: Issuance

properties.description: If affiliated with a specific project, enter the project's name here.
properties.title: Project Name

properties.description: If the associated project has an ID code, enter it here.
properties.title: Project ID

properties.description: Notes, comments, corrections to the publication record; typically done by library staff or other administrators of the system
properties.title: Notes

properties.description: Keywords supplied by the author to facilitate discovery.
properties.title: Author-supplied keywords

properties.description: I have read and agree to the repository submission agreement.
properties.title: Submission Agreement

properties.description: A URI to an appropriate statement from Rightsstatements.org. View details at http://rightsstatements.org

options.index: NO COPYRIGHT - OTHER KNOWN LEGAL RESTRICTIONS
IN COPYRIGHT - RIGHTS-HOLDER(S) UNLOCATABLE OR UNIDENTIFIABLE

properties.title: Rights Statement

properties.description: Additional information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages.
properties.title: Use and Reproduction

create.value: <accessCondition type="use and reproduction" displayLabel="Creative Commons license">%value%</accessCondition>

properties.description: If your object or its parent collection have a Local Contexts Project Identifier to enable TK Labels, add it here. Projects can be created at https://localcontextshub.org/.
properties.title: Local Contexts Project ID
